title: Zero COVID-19 fatalities confirmed
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s COVID-19 death toll remains at 16,492 with zero COVID-19 fatalities confirmed on Monday.

According to the Epidemiology Unit, 76.28% of the total COVID-19 deaths are from the over-60 age group, 22.4% of the total COVID-19 deaths are between 30 and 59 years, and 1.32% of the total COVID-19 deaths are below 30.
A total of 9,306 COVID-19 deaths confirmed to date are male and 7,186 are female.
